title: About
subtitle: Learn more about Chat Central
heroDescription: Unified AI conversation manager for Claude, ChatGPT, and Gemini. Keep all your AI conversations organized in one place.
featureAutoSyncDesc: Automatically track conversations as you chat with AI assistants
featureSearchDesc: Find any conversation across all platforms instantly
featureStorageDesc: Your data stays securely on your device, never on servers
featureFavoritesDesc: Star important conversations for quick access anytime
featurePrivacyDesc: No tracking, no analytics, completely private
